text: These unstoppable ideals are held deep in the heart of man.
As long as there are people who seek freedom in this life.
These things shall not vanish from the earth...
People tell me my head's in the clouds. I don't care what they say because I'm dreamin' of you.
You are the treasure I've found. So bright, so bold yet so elusive.
It's hard to look away even though it's blinding me. There are no words to describe how I feel inside.
I'm really really stuck on you wow wow~. I have to follow my dreams however crazy they seem.
And I won't stop 'til I get there, you will see.
You're all I need to have the strength to believe. Believe in Wonderland!
I'm gonna follow my dreams however crazy they seem. I'm gonna share them with you, a love so true.
You're all I want, together we can move on. Live how we want to!
There is no limit to us, we have the power of love. And we don't wanna live ordinary lives.
We have the chance to live in paradise. Believe in Wonderland!
